name: Anti-Dovic 2020
description:
Oh no! The human user has accidentally created a virus! Better make sure it doesn't get out of control! 

You are an anti virus - Anti-Dovic 2020.

A virus is spreading throughout the system - you must upgrade and quarantine it or find all the password letters before it infects the Root folder. Scan files and folders to look for license upgrades and password letters. Set quarantines - but watch out, they don't last forever! 

The human user will sometimes try to do things to help out - but may just make things worse...

Good Luck!

WASD to navigate file system :-

    W and S to cycle up and down current folder

    A to go back into the parent folder

    D to go into a folder

Space to bring up the pop up menu

W and S to cycle pop up menu options

Tab to close pop up menu

E to choose pop up menu option

Code and Art by Kathleen Bruce (me)

Commodore 64 pixelized font by Devin D. Cook www.DevinCook.com
